channel.title: Second half of Surface Tension...
channel.description:
...supposed to be at night? To be specific- I am talking about after you kill the apache and climb through the drain pipes in to the man-made canals. It looks like there is light coming from the sun but the skybox is completely dark. I can still play but it is just odd. Is this on purpose?
BTW: I love how you guys made Questionable Ethics. It is creepy as fuck now.

item.title: Second half of Surface Tension...
item.dc:creator: Vanzetti
item.description:
You are not the only one. I get this every time I reload a save and it’s annoying as hell.

Read full topic

item.title: Second half of Surface Tension...
item.dc:creator: londonian
item.description:
On the next load screen the skybox went back to “day”. Rare glitch since I am the only one that posted it.

Read full topic

item.title: Second half of Surface Tension...
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
No, that seems like a genuine bug!

Read full topic
